title: LFLauncher
hero_description: Easily install mods, configure, and play Minecraft for free.
feature_mod_desc: Integrated with many popular Minecraft mods.
feature_cross_platform_desc: Works well on Windows, macOS, and Linux.
install_step_2: Open the installer and follow the instructions.
install_step_3: Log in or create a Minecraft account.
install_step_4: Choose a Minecraft version and start playing.
win_desc: Supports Windows 7 and above, both 64-bit and 32-bit.
faq_a1: Yes, LFLauncher is completely free to download and use.
faq_a2: You can add mods to the 'mods' folder or use the built-in mod manager.
faq_a3: LFLauncher ensures user account security with modern encryption and does not share information with third parties.
copyright: © 2025 LFLauncher Pro Clone. All rights reserved.
